message.content: {"given_definition_quality":45,"better_definition":"to help someone; to give help","sentence":"他们帮忙。","image_prompt":"A group of friendly people helping each other, with one person holding out a hand to assist another who is carrying a box. The scene is warm and supportive, set on a soft, gently crumbling city street, with pastel colors, soft lighting, and subtle signs of an apocalypse in the background like overgrown plants and cracked pavement. Animation style, soft and hopeful atmosphere.","sentence_translation":"They help."}
